actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-603.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 388 - 3 (Record Vote No: 154).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5879) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend for three years the authorization for appropriations for refugee assistance, to make certain improvements in the operation of the program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5879 (Refugee assistance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5879) to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to extend for three years the authorization for appropriations for refugee assistance, to make certain improvements in the operation of the program, and for other purposes.
